newsitem.title: USA: Plenum Publishing Q4 shr $1.26 vs $0.98.
newsitem.headline: Plenum Publishing Q4 shr $1.26 vs $0.98.

text.p: (All data above 000s except per share numbers)
NOTE: Full company name is Plenum Publishing Corp.
1996 Q4 and full-year period ended December 31.
All share figures include discontinued operations. 1996 shr includes a $0.09 gain, 1995 shr a $0.03 loss, while 1995 Q4 shr has a $0.05 loss. 1996 Q4 does not have any adjustment.
